# matterArray

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/PeteHaitch/matterArray.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/PeteHaitch/matterArray)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/PeteHaitch/matterArray/master.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/PeteHaitch/matterArray?branch=master)

**matterArray** is an array-like container for convenient access and 
manipulation of [**matter**](https://bioconductor.org/packages/matter/) 
datasets. Supports delayed operations and block processing.

## Installation

You can install **matterArray** from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("PeteHaitch/matterArray")
```
